name: VividCast Holobeam
description: A small, portable device that projects 3D holographic images, useful for displaying maps, blueprints, or decoys.

name: InfoGlide
description:
A handheld device for accessing, storing, and transferring data. Can be used to access archives, or communicate remotely.

Device Integrity: 2
Firewall: 6
IC Level: 3
Signal Range: 10

name: PowerCore V5
description: A compact, rechargeable power source used to fuel various gadgets, tools, and small vehicles.

name: Terrascan Pro
description: A portable device that scans the environment for life forms, energy signatures, or chemical compositions wihin a 5km radius. Ideal for exploration and investigation.

name: Internatorch
description: A high-powered cutting tool that uses plasma to slice through metal and other tough materials. Essential for breaching barriers.

name: Envirodome Compact
description: A collapsible, lightweight shelter that provides protection from the elements and hostile environments. Can be set up quickly in any terrain.

name: AirPurity XT
description: A breathing apparatus that filters and purifies the air, making it safe to breathe in toxic or low-oxygen environments.

name: Nutripak Sustain
description: Compact, nutrient-rich food supplies designed for long-term storage and consumption during expeditions or emergencies. Each pack sustains for one day.

name: Hydrasync
description: A portable device that extracts and purifies water from the environment, ensuring a clean and safe water supply in any situation.

name: Heatwave Ultra
description: A heat-reflective blanket that provides warmth and insulation in extreme cold conditions. Compact and easy to carry.

name: Rescuesignal Mk II
description: A distress signal device that broadcasts your location to nearby allies or rescue teams. Equipped with a variety of signal modes.

name: G-Force Boots
description: Boots equipped withgravity technology or magnets, allowing the wearer to traverse difficult terrain, including zero-gravity environments.

name: AscendTech Climbers
description: Ropes, hooks and other devices to help safely climb buildings or rocks.

name: Sunpower Fold
description: A portable solar panel that can charge batteries and devices using sunlight, essential for long-term survival away from civilization.

name: Medifoam XT
description: A medical tool that injects biofoam into wounds to stop bleeding. Requires 4 AP to use.

name: HealGel Alpha
description: A healing salve that promotes rapid tissue regeneration, effective for treating wounds, burns, and other injuries. Once applied, it provides +4 pool bonus to the nightly regeneration, and regenerates and extra 20% of the maximum health.

name: Quickboost Inject
description:
A quick-injection drug (requires 3 AP to use) that boosts physical performance, increasing strength, speed and constitution by +2 for 10 minutes.

After that, the user loses 1d6 health (cannot cause an injury roll).

name: Adrena Max
description:
A quick-injection drug (requires 3 AP to use) that either provides +2 AP for 5 minutes, or that wakes up someone who became unconscious.

After the 5 Minutes are over, an Injury roll with 5 dice must be made, but the maximum severity suffered is limited to 1.

name: Cerebraboost
description:
A cognitive booster in the form of a pill that sharpens mental faculties, improving memory, focus, and problem-solving abilities for a limited time.
It takes 5 Minutes for the effects to kick in. The user then gains +1 Intelligence and Education for 6 hours.

When the effects wear off, the user suffers the "Dizzy" wound.

name: Vira Guard
description: A cure for most viruses and infections, providing immunity or relief from symptoms.

name: Nocicept Block
description:
A drug that blocks pain receptors, allowing the user to function normally despite injuries or other debilitating conditions.
It takes 5 Minutes for the effects of the pill to kick in. The user then ignores the effects (but not injury pool modifiers) of all severity 1 and 2 wounds for 1d6 hours.

When the effects wear off, the user suffers the "Nausea" wound and has to make a Survival d2 roll. If failed, they become addicted or suffer withdrawal symptoms.

name: BattleX Stims
description:
A quick-injection drug (requires 3 AP to use) that increases combat efficiency, boosting reflexes, accuracy, and aggression.
The user gains +1 pool bonus to all physical combat related checks, and reduces the pool of their injury checks by 2 (to a Minimum of 0). Lasts for 10 Minutes.

When the effects wear off, the user suffers 2d6 damage (ignoring armor).

name: Slumbersync
description: A drug that can either suppress the need for sleep or induce restful sleep, depending on the dosage and application.

name: Dreamwave
description: A drug that induces vivid hallucinations, which can be used recreationally or for nefarious purposes, like disorienting an enemy.

name: Ares Lifesaver
description: A set of tools and basic supplies to perform first aid or even surgery.

name: Mindmirror
description: This circular tool can be placed around a person's alive or dead head. Over 5 Minutes it will create a scan to create an engram of their mind, but it will irrevocably destroy the brain in the process. The engram is typically faulty or incomplete, but can be sufficient to be used in a simulation for further questioning.

name: Shadow-Ops Gear
description: A set of tools specifically designed for bypassing security systems, including lockpicks, signal jammers, and data scramblers.

name: Ciphercrack
description: Once applied to a MagLock, the device requires 1d6 minutes to find the right combination, opening the lock once.

name: Chameleonwrap
description: A wearable cloak that adapts to the surrounding environment, providing camouflage. While being stationary or moving cautiously, gain +3 pool to any attempts to stay hidden.

name: Nanoclone
description: Allows to apply a paste that will change the facial structure into a specific shape, by programming it once through a Data Pad. The cream can be re-used later by mixing it with a solution that costs half the price of the cream itself.

name: Vox Morph
description: A device hidden near the throat that alters the user’s voice to mimic others or create entirely new vocal patterns, useful for impersonation or deception.

name: Scansafe
description: A handheld scanner that detects and neutralizes hidden surveillance devices within half a meter of the device, including cameras, microphones, and tracking beacons.

name: Echoprobe
description: A tiny device that sticks to surfaces and will record and broadcast audio in its surroundings to connected devices. Has a broadcasting range of 250m.

name: Lensworm
description: A small device that can easily be stuck in corners, plants or similar to record video in a fixed angle, broadcasting its signal to connected devices. Has a broadcasting range of 50m.

name: Mindshift Disruptor
description: A neural device that temporarily erases short-term memories, useful for covering tracks or avoiding interrogation.

name: Codeclone
description: Can copy physical and card-based keys swiftly.

name: Nanotrack
description: A tiny, nearly undetectable transmitter that can be planted on a target to track their movements or relay information. Has a broadcasting range of 10km.

name: Echoshield
description: A portable device that emits white noise to mask conversations, preventing eavesdropping and protecting against audio surveillance.

name: Spectrascope
description: A compact device that combines high-definition zoom with directional audio capture, allowing you to spy on distant targets and eavesdrop on conversations with precision.

name: PrintForce X1
description: A portable fabricator that can create physical objects from digital blueprints using various materials. Ideal for crafting custom tools or parts. The material cost is equal to 5% of the aspired item, and the process takes a few minutes. 3D printed mechanical / electrical items (like weapons) break as soon as a botch or two complications were rolled (regardless if these were triggered or not). Assembling an item from the printed parts requires a few minutes and a Tech check - the difficulty is equal to the rarity of the item - 2 (to a Minimum of 2).

name: Partdetect
description: A handheld device that scans items to identify their components, making it easier to disassemble or reverse-engineer technology. Requires a Sensors check to use.

name: Biomech Set
description: A specialized set of tools for installing, repairing, or upgrading cybernetic implants and prosthetics.

name: Recycle Pro
description: A device that breaks down junk and scrap into usable materials, reducing waste and providing resources for repairs. You gain 1/4th of the item's value in components - convert the value into Spare Tech or Spare Ship parts.

name: Flexitool 21-in-1
description: A versatile tool kit that can transform into different configurations such as a wrench, screwdriver, or laser cutter. Essential for repairs and tinkering.

name: Labpack Synthesis
description: A mini lab consisting of various devices to synthesize components using a Science check.

name: Ship-Complement 101
description: Allows one repair attempt on a critically damaged ship part. Is used up with the attempt.

name: Azerra Fixermould
description: Allows one repair attempt on a damaged firearm or smaller piece of technology. Is used up with the attempt.

name: Triton Sealgel
description: Allows for a Tech d0 check, requiring one hour of time. Each success restores 2 points of durability of the damaged armor. Then the Fixgel is used up.

name: A38-License
description: Provides a digital, legal permit to possess one specific weapon or cyberware. This is only relevant for items that fall under military regulations and that can be used offensively.

name: Echolink Holocomm
description:
A wrist-mounted or handheld device that allows for real-time holographic communication across vast distances.

Device Integrity: 2
Firewall: 6
IC Level: 3
Signal Range: 5

name: Lingua-Master 2200
description: A device that instantly translates spoken or written language, allowing communication with any species or dialect. Due to the delay in communication and lack of nuance, you suffer +1 difficulty on all social checks.

name: Credivault
description: A digital currency storage device that allows the user to make transactions and store funds securely.

name: Immersi Gear
description: A device that immerses the user in a virtual environment, useful for entertainment, training, communication or direct drone control. When controlling a drone directly, the drone rigger uses their own skills in Gunnery (shooting), Pilot (melee, stealth and movement), Sensors (perception and data interpretation) and Tech (instead of Survival rolls).

name: Overlit
description: Can display certain virtual overlays, e.g. to make digital ads in front of stores visible, or to read messages on the fly, keeping the hands free.

name: Callisto Extender
description: This device acts as a node with its own Signal Range of 10 squares. It can be slaved to a cyberdeck, data pad or holo-communicator, but both devices need to touch each other to establish an encrypted channel. The direct communication range between this device and its master device is 10km.

name: PhantomLink
description:
Device Integrity: 5
Firewall: 9
IC Level: 3
Signal Range: 20

If others use the "Locate" action against you, they need to spend 3 AT instead.

name: Quantum Splicer
description:
Device Integrity: 5
Firewall: 6
IC Level: 3
Signal Range: 50

Treat enemy firewalls as if they are 2 points lower.

name: SpecterNode
description:
Device Integrity: 6
Firewall: 8
IC Level: 4
Signal Range: 25

AT generated with this cyberdeck do not decay over time.

name: Overlord Mk-IV
description:
Device Integrity: 8
Firewall: 7
IC Level: 4
Signal Range: 25

The "Hijack" option only costs 2 instead of 3 AT.

name: Nexus X-9
description:
Device Integrity: 10
Firewall: 8
IC Level: 5
Signal Range: 15

Gain +1 pool bonus when hacking.

name: Sentinel Core
description:
Grants your cyberdeck +2 integrity.

Increase the cost of this upgrade by +250 Credits for each Upgrade that has already been installed. Each type may only be installed once.

name: Aegis Defender
description:
Grants your cyberdeck +2 firewall.

Increase the cost of this upgrade by +250 Credits for each Upgrade that has already been installed. Each type may only be installed once.

name: Nemesis Protocol
description:
Grants your cyberdeck +1 IC Level.

Increase the cost of this upgrade by +250 Credits for each Upgrade that has already been installed. Each type may only be installed once.

name: BitRepeater
description:
Doubles the signal range of your cyberdeck.

Increase the cost of this upgrade by +250 Credits for each Upgrade that has already been installed. Each type may only be installed once.

name: Hijack Dominus
description:
Enemy hackers need to spend twice the amount of AT on the Cancel option to remove any Hijack option you have ongoing.

Installing a Netrunner Suite reduces your device's integrity by 1.

name: Neural Reaper
description:
Whenever you use an AT on a target device, you may decide to cause 4 Biofeedback damage (ignoring armor) against any neurally linked user for each AT spent.

Installing a Netrunner Suite reduces your device's integrity by 1.

name: ZeroDay Purge
description:
When you use the Cancel option to remove AT from a target system, you remove 2 AT per usage of the option instead of just 1.

Installing a Netrunner Suite reduces your device's integrity by 1.

name: HexCorruptor
description:
Whenever you use an AT on a target device, you may decide to cause 1 Data Corruption for each AT spent. You can decide to spend your AT directly on disrupting the device's integrity, in which case you cause 3 Data Corruption per AT spent.

Installing a Netrunner Suite reduces your device's integrity by 1.

name: Phantomtrail
description:
You can spend 2 AT on a target device to cause it to get a falsified location when it uses the Locate option against you. The locating hacker can attempt a Computers d4 check to notice the false lead.

Installing a Netrunner Suite reduces your device's integrity by 1.
